content:
Fersigbaum family

1 Mayer Selig FERSIGBAUM             1745 - 1829 #345 {census family 109}
 + Hicel                             1752 - Sep 14, 1811 #54a (Isaac)
  2x Wulf Mayer FERSIGBAUM           1766 - 1836 #331 {census family 160}
    + Frumet                         1768 - 1836 #163 (Kalman)
     3x Isaac Aron FERSIGBAUM        1794
